name: F-Hero (andyherbert)
description:
A race to save the planet!

You are Jeff Hero, a brave pilot who has to race the evil Professor Xero in order to save the planet!

Controls:

  •  Z: accelerate.
  • Left and Right: steering.
  • X (plus steering): power turn.
  • Up: Engage turbo (once per lap).

Good luck out there... you'll need it!

Music by TonalRumblePack (Many thanks!)
